title: SCKAN2PMR
description: An array of objects containing mappings between SCKAN ontology terms and cellml models in the PMR.

cellmls.description: List of cellml files related to an ontology term

cellml.description: URL of the cellml file for the model in the Physiome Project

workspace.description: URL of the workspace for the model in the Physiome Project

score.description: Similarity score between ontology term and cellml file

exposure.description: URL of the exposure for the model in the Physiome Project
